This sketchnote is interactive. Try clicking around various parts of the image

This sketchnote was drawn with Notability in Nov 2022. This website is licensed under a CC BY 4.0. This means you are free to share or adapt these materials however you see fit as long as you provide attribution (@cynthiahqy)

Source Code
---
title: "Template for Sketchnote Page"
date: 2022-11-01

image: "images/featured.png"
image-alt: "alt-text for featured image"
resources:
  - "images/how-to-publish-a-sketchnote.svg"

params:
  drawing_tool: "notability"
  date_drawn: 2022-11-01
  interactive: TRUE
  
format:
  html:
    code-tools: true
---

:::{.column-page}
  <object data="images/how-to-publish-a-sketchnote.svg" class="sketchnote" aria-label="insert alt text here">
  </object>
:::

## Notes on source code
  Toggle the `</> code` menu to see the source code for the `.qmd` file.
  The `class="sketchnote"`

This is some text about the sketchnote.

Some links related to this image:
- link to media (show/book/media etc.)

:::{.callout-note collapse="true"}
## Below is some parameterised text about the sketchnote
  Uses values set in `params:` option in this documents YAML header. Toggle `</> code` to see source.
:::

`r if(params$interactive){"This sketchnote is interactive. Try clicking around various parts of the image"}`

```{r params-prep}
#| echo: false

source("../_params-dict.R")

# https://statisticsglobe.com/r-capitalize-first-letter-of-character-string-containing-multiple-words
dtool <- gsub("(^|[[:space:]])([[:alpha:]])", "\\1\\U\\2",
              params$drawing_tool,
              perl = TRUE) ## to uppercase
dtool_url <- dtools[tolower(dtools$tool) == tolower(dtool), c("url")]
dtool_link <- glue::glue("[{dtool}]({dtool_url})")

ddate <- as.Date(params$date_drawn)
```

This sketchnote was drawn with `r dtool_link` in `r format(ddate, "%b %Y")`. This website is licensed under a CC BY 4.0. This means you are free to share or adapt these materials however you see fit as long as you provide attribution (@cynthiahqy)
